mapper.select: SELECT c.id AS cartItemId, c.product_id AS productId, p.product_name AS productName, c.quantity, p.price FROM bg_cart c JOIN bg_product p ON c.product_id = p.id WHERE c.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bg_cart (user_id, product_id, quantity, added_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{productId}, #{quantity}, NOW())
